Quartermaster:
The man to whom I could help, should have sufficient qualification to perform errands of the Goddess Einhasad. Because a priest have certain obligations.
(This quest can performed only Gladiator, Warlord, Paladin, Dark Avenger, Treasure Hunter, Arrows, Sorcerer, Necromancer, Warlock, Bishops, Preachers level 76, had his 2nd profession.)
